resources.string: Find the Liar
An exciting game where you spot the fake answers and uncover the liars!
Benkralex
All players answer a question – except the liar(s), who get a different one. Then, all answers and the main question are shown. Discuss the answers together and figure out who the liar is!
Players
Player
Playername
Liar Count
Own Opinion
Own Ability
Personal
What is your favorite color?
What color is overrated?
What is the best movie you've ever seen?
What movie is totally overrated?
What do you usually eat for breakfast?
What is something you never eat for breakfast?
What hidden talent do you have?
What is something you’re really bad at?
Which app do you use the most on your phone?
Which app do you never use on your phone?
What’s your dream job?
What job would be your worst nightmare?
What was your best subject in school?
Which subject did you hate the most?
What place do you visit the most?
What place do you avoid?
What is your favorite drink?
What drink do you dislike?
What is your favorite animal?
What animal are you afraid of?
What are you most proud of?
What is something you’re ashamed of?
What’s your favorite thing to do on the weekend?
What’s something you never do on weekends?
What’s the best gift you’ve ever received?
What’s a gift you didn’t like?
What’s your favorite holiday?
What holiday do you find annoying?
What value is most important to you?
What value do you find overrated?

What kind of music do you hate?

What activity stresses you out the most?

What book do you think is boring?

Which subject would you skip if you could?

What sport do you find boring?
